description: Christof Gramm has faced criticism for his efforts to tackle links between the army and extremism.
title: Germany far right: Intelligence chief forced out amid criticism
title_page: Germany far right: Intelligence chief forced out amid criticism - BBC News
maintext: But the MAD has come under fire in recent times for not doing enough to tackle extremism in the Bundeswehr [German army]. A series of high-profile incidents has also raised concerns over the influence of the far right.
